For me, this is an absolute classic, especially an essential doujin for all 'huge breasts' fans out there. Right, irl huge breasts are not really pleasant and not something that I like, in fact it's kinda weird; but for these 2D waifus, this shit turns me on. Also, Queen Bee may not be my favorite animation studio but hey, they always stick to the source so that was a huge plus and I love that. The stories here are pretty welcoming too, no fucking NTR, shit trash blackmailing (well to MC as plot device) or rape, nor bullshit ugly bastards, delinquent guys, nor scat/urination, nor gore/vore/violence, nor all that crazy shit.
